Bypass anti CSRF token of Yandex!

07 May 2014
When you browse a link in docviewer.yandex.com, The site will recreate a token named sk, which is used to validate a redirection and anti-csrf token sk is also an anti-csrf token on http://webmaster.yandex.ru`,`https://docviewer.yandex.com/r.xml. now If the attacker know the value of your sk token, he can make a redirection and...
